author: Breitbart London, Breitbart London
title: Canada: Wife of Prime Minister Trudeau Recovered from Coronavirus
description: TORONTO (AP) - Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's wife said Saturday that she has recovered from being ill from Covid-19 disease caused by the new coronavirus.
content:
TORONTO (AP) – Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s wife said Saturday that she has recovered from being ill from Covid-19 disease caused by the new coronavirus.
“I am feeling so much better,” Sophie Gregoire Trudeau said in a statement on social media. … [+2379 chars]
